JOB DESCRIPTION: Qualification :   BEB-Tech (Computers Information Technology), MCA with 1-2 years of experience in any field.     Roles and Responsibility :     Understand the given requirement and develop software module for the same.   Design, Code and Test the modules   Additing new features to existing software or enhance current software performance   Work with designers and business development officer to understand client requirements and develop features accordingly   Provide support and training to Business Development Officers and Clients as and when required.
